  • Method Details

    • getAllowedFullMoves

      public HashSet<Move> getAllowedFullMoves(ChessGame game)
      Returns all allowed moves of the piece. The moves for each pieceType are composed of several abstract moves.
      Parameters:
      game - Game context
      Returns:
      A HashSet of all allowed moves of the piece in this individual game context.

    • getAllowedMoves

      public ArrayList<Square> getAllowedMoves(ChessGame game)
      Converts AllowedFullMoves to an array of Squares representing only the destination of the move.
      Parameters:
      game - Game context
      Returns:
      ArrayList of possible Squares to move to.

    • getMainDirection

      public boolean getMainDirection()

    • isChecked

      public boolean isChecked()
      Method to check whether the king is checked
      Returns:
      bool true if king is not save, else returns false

    • isCheckmatedOrStalemated

      public int isCheckmatedOrStalemated(ChessGame game)
      Method to check is the king is checked or stalemated
      Returns:
      int 0 if nothing, 1 if checkmate, else returns 2

      protected boolean isout(int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      x - x position on chessboard

      Returns:
      true if parameters are out of bounds (array)

    • checkPiece

      protected boolean checkPiece(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - y position on chessboard
      y - y position on chessboard
      Returns:
      true if can move, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if owner(player) is different
